snippet: Real Madrid, the Spanish league leader, stumbled in the title race for the second straight week with a 1-0 loss at Athletic Bilbao on Saturday.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Real Madrid defeats Athletic Bilbao, 1-0; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Real Madrid, the Spanish league leader, stumbled in the title race for the second straight week with a 1-0 loss at Athletic Bilbao on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Madrid’s Loss Opens Door for Barcelona; Fans Turn Violent at an F.A. Cup Match
headline.main: Madrid’s Loss Opens Door for Barcelona; Fans Turn Violent at an F.A. Cup Match
